name: Vorrak
storyline:
The harsh sunlight of Chi Draconis glints off your datavisor as you send your high delta-vee fighter diving for the Vorrakian orbital fortress. The fortress is huge, carved out of a massive asteroid, with endless patrols of cruisers. It seems impregnable.

But long range neutrino scans have revealed a flaw. A small fissure in the north east quadrant. One that leads all the way to the core!

You and your wing mates are the last hope of the enslaved people of Draconis. One of you must penetrate all the deadly defences to destroy the fortresses power emerald, or the last flicker of freedom around Chi Draconis will die - forever!
